memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short exportid, unsigned int index, unsigned int mod, cache_content_client_t *pclient_data, cache_inode_client_t *pclient_inode, hash_table_t *ht, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_content_status_t *pstatus)
memberdef.name: cache_content_crash_recover

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_crash_recover: recovers the data cache and the associated inode after a crash.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management. [OUT] returned status.
